==Genius Invokation TCG: Radiant Secrets==
{{Description|Genius Invokation TCG: Radiant Secrets has added all-new cards to obtain, new players to challenge in the open world, and new [[Tavern Challenge]]s.<br>More friends can now be invited to take part in invitation duels.<br>In addition, a new [[Heated Battle Mode]] has been added alongside the [[Arena of Champions]] and [[The Forge Realm's Temper]] events.<br>Hit "[[Prince]]" up to take part in The Forge Realm's Temper, through which you can obtain [[Lucky Coin]]s.<br>If you are confident in your skills, you can use the [[Invitation Board]] to participate in the Arena of Champions, increasing the stakes and the fun of your duels.|[[Version 3.7]] Events Overview}}
[[File:Genius Invokation TCG Radiant Secrets.png|400px]]
{{Description|Radiant Secrets has added loads of all-new cards to obtain. These not only include companions, but also some Enemies of Note...<br>More open-world players are waiting for you to challenge them, and there are new and extremely difficult Tavern Challenges and "The Forge Realm's Temper" challenges to try out.<br>Additionally, the all-new Heated Battle Mode gameplay "Sprinting Stratagems" will be made available for a limited time during this version. In this gameplay mode, players will select their lineups on the spot, Action Cards will be automatically generated for them, and duels will follow a concise set of special rules. Sit back, relax, and enjoy fun, fast-paced games of Genius Invokation TCG!|[[Version 4.3]] Events Overview}}
[[File:Genius Invokation TCG Radiant Secrets 2.png|400px]]
